name: @amzn/asr_lambdas
description: Non-Orchestrator Lambda functions in ASR, including the Pre-processor and backend API lambdas.

scripts.test:sequential:preprocessor: npm run build:clean:ts && export POWERTOOLS_DEV=true && jest --selectProjects 'Pre-processor Unit Tests' --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=pre-processor/coverage --silent
scripts.test:sequential:common: npm run build:clean:ts && export POWERTOOLS_DEV=true && jest --selectProjects 'Common Unit Tests' --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=common/coverage --silent
scripts.test:sequential:api: npm run build:clean:ts && export POWERTOOLS_DEV=true && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/.bin/jest --selectProjects 'API Unit Tests' --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=api/coverage --silent
scripts.test:sequential:synchronization: npm run build:clean:ts && export POWERTOOLS_DEV=true && jest --selectProjects 'Synchronization Unit Tests' --runInBand --coverage --coverageDirectory=synchronization/coverage --silent
